companyDescription: Leading AI-powered DevSecOps platform providing integrated software development lifecycle tools

businessFunctions.description: Sales team uses Claude to quickly generate and customize RFP responses, while marketing team efficiently generates and translates content
Developers create small applications and scripts for automation, technical writers improve documentation consistency and clarity
Teams upload reports and use Claude to ask questions and gain insights from data

rolesAffected: Product Lead for AI and ML
businessFunctions.description: Leadership driving AI adoption across departments and strategic partnership with Anthropic

implementation.approach: Dual implementation: Anthropic API for external product offerings and Claude Enterprise plan for internal use across departments
implementation.integrationMethod: API and Claude for Work Enterprise plan
implementation.timeline: Initial pilot program followed by steady expansion across organization

quantitativeMetrics.context: GitLab team members surveyed reported to be satisfied or very satisfied with Claude for Work
quantitativeMetrics.source: 98% of GitLab team members surveyed reported to be satisfied or very satisfied with Claude for Work

qualitativeBenefits.description: Major reduction in time spent on RFP responses and content generation
qualitativeBenefits.source: Significant time savings in RFP responses and content generation

qualitativeBenefits.description: Enhanced skill sharing across teams with ability to share specific chats
qualitativeBenefits.source: Improved collaboration and skill sharing across teams

qualitativeBenefits.description: Team members more willing to take on complex tasks using Claude as capability extension
qualitativeBenefits.source: Team members more likely to take on complex tasks

qualitativeBenefits.description: Fostered culture of efficiency, empowerment, and collaboration around AI use
qualitativeBenefits.source: Everyone who uses Claude emphasizes that it enhances productivity. That is consistent across the board
